revision.text:
{{Infobox Berry |name = #02 Atania (Chesto) |image = [[File:Chesto.png]] |caption = Tiene la piel gruesa, la pulpa dura y un sabor seco, pero es totalmente comestible. |growtime = 40s |harvest = 3 bayas |replant = 50% |points = 6 |flavor =
*0 picante *10 seco *0 dulce *0 amargo *0 ácido }} '''Atania (Chesto)''' es un tipo de [[Berries|baya]] que puede ser plantada en la [[Farm|Granja]] para obtener [[Farming Points|Puntos de Granja]]. Se puede obtener como recomensa aleatoria al derrotar Pokémon salvajes en las rutas.
{| class="wikitable" | style = "image-rendering: pixelated" |+ Growth Stages !!! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 5 secs || 15 secs || 25 secs || 40 secs - 1 min 20 secs |- ! Animation |
[[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] ||
[[File:ChestoTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:ChestoTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
[[File:ChestoTreeBerry.png|50px]] |}
{| class="wikitable collapsible" | style="text-align: center;" |+ Ripening Time with Modifiers ! Modifier !! Ripe-Wither Time |- ! None | 40 secs -
1 min 20 secs |- ! Sprayduck | 27 secs -
53 secs |}
== Flow Chart == [[File:Chesto_Flow_Chart.png|100px]]
==Uses== ===Mutations===
Chesto berries can be used to mutate the following berries.
{| class="wikitable" | style="text-align: center;" |- ! Used In !! With |- | [[File:Bluk.png|20px]] [[Bluk]] || [[File:Leppa.png|20px]] [[Leppa]] |- | [[File:Wiki.png|20px]] [[Wiki]] || - |- | [[File:Lum.png|20px]] [[Lum]] || [[File:Cheri.png|20px]] [[Cheri]]
[[File:Pecha.png|20px]] [[Pecha]]
[[File:Rawst.png|20px]] [[Rawst]]
[[File:Aspear.png|20px]] [[Aspear]]
[[File:Leppa.png|20px]] [[Leppa]]
[[File:Oran.png|20px]] [[Oran]]
[[File:Sitrus.png|20px]] [[Sitrus]] |- | [[File:Kelpsy.png|20px]] [[Kelpsy]] || [[File:Persim.png|20px]] [[Persim]] |- | [[File:Passho.png|20px]] [[Passho]] || [[File:Oran.png|20px]] [[Oran]]
[[File:Kelpsy.png|20px]] [[Kelpsy]]
[[File:Coba.png|20px]] [[Coba]] |- | [[File:Coba.png|20px]] [[Coba]] || [[File:Aguav.png|20px]] [[Aguav]] |- |}
==Acquisition== ===Dungeons=== {{Loot/head‎|Berries}} {{LootItem|Pokemon Tower|Common}} {{LootItem|Berry Forest|Common}} {{LootItem|Pinwheel Forest|Common}} {{LootItem|Pokémon Village|Common}} {{LootItem|Aether Foundation|Common}} {{LootItem|Lake of the Sunne and Moone|Common}} |} |}

revision.text:
{{Infobox Berry |name = #02 Atania (Chesto) |image = [[File:Chesto.png]] |caption = Tiene la piel gruesa, la pulpa dura y un sabor seco, pero es totalmente comestible. |growtime = 40s |harvest = 3 bayas |replant = 50% |points = 6 |flavor =
*0 picante *10 seco *0 dulce *0 amargo *0 ácido }}
'''Chesto''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]] to obtain [[Farming Points|Farm Points]]. It can be obtained as a random drop by defeating wild Pokémon on routes.
{| class="wikitable" | style = "image-rendering: pixelated" |+ Growth Stages !!! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 5 secs || 15 secs || 25 secs || 40 secs - 1 min 20 secs |- ! Animation |

[[File:ChestoTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
[[File:ChestoTreeBerry.png|50px]] |}
{| class="wikitable collapsible" | style="text-align: center;" |+ Ripening Time with Modifiers ! Modifier !! Ripe-Wither Time |- ! None | 40 secs -
1 min 20 secs |- ! Sprayduck | 27 secs -
53 secs |}
== Flow Chart == [[File:Chesto_Flow_Chart.png|100px]]
==Uses== ===Mutations===
Chesto berries can be used to mutate the following berries.
